mapper.insert: INSERT INTO forum.member_auth (member_seq, auth_num, auth_uri, reg_dtm, expire_dtm, auth_yn) VALUES( #{memberSeq}, '', #{authUri}, #{regDtm}, #{expireDtm}, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT auth_seq, member_seq, auth_num, auth_uri, reg_dtm, expire_dtm, auth_yn FROM forum.member_auth WHERE auth_uri = #{uri} AND auth_yn = 'N'
